# Autogenerated file, run tools/build/setup_cmake.py to regenerate

include_directories(${ANN_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${AVROCPP_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.REGEX_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${CGAL_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${PROTOBUF_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${RMF_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_INCLUDE_PATH})
link_directories(${ANN_LINK_PATH}
        ${AVROCPP_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.REGEX_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${CGAL_LINK_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_LINK_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_LINK_PATH}
        ${PROTOBUF_LINK_PATH}
        ${RMF_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LINK_PATH})

set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} ${NPCTRANSPORT_CXX_FLAGS}")


File(GLOB runtimepytests "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/npctransport/test_*.py")

math(EXPR short_timeout "${IMP_TIMEOUT_FACTOR} * 5")
math(EXPR medium_timeout "${IMP_TIMEOUT_FACTOR} * 15")
math(EXPR expensive_timeout "${IMP_TIMEOUT_FACTOR} * 120")

# should make into function
foreach (test ${runtimepytests} ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/npctransport/test/test_avro_reader.py
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/npctransport/test/test_exclude_zrange_score.py
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/npctransport/test/test_glue.py
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/npctransport/test/test_init_from_rmf.py
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/npctransport/test/test_linear.py
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/npctransport/test/test_linear_scores.py
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/npctransport/test/test_protobufs.py
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/npctransport/test/test_rmf_sites.py
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/npctransport/test/test_sites.py
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/npctransport/test/test_slabss.py
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/npctransport/test/test_statistics.py
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/npctransport/test/test_util.py
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/npctransport/test/test_well.py)
  GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name ${test} NAME)
  add_test("npctransport.${name}" ${IMP_TEST_SETUP} python ${test})
  set_tests_properties("npctransport.${name}" PROPERTIES LABELS "IMP.npctransport;test;length_short")
  set_tests_properties("npctransport.${name}" PROPERTIES TIMEOUT ${short_timeout})
  set_tests_properties("npctransport.${name}" PROPERTIES COST 1)
endforeach(test)

foreach (test )
  GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name ${test} NAME)
  add_test("npctransport.${name}" ${IMP_TEST_SETUP} python ${test})
  set_tests_properties("npctransport.${name}" PROPERTIES LABELS "IMP.npctransport;test;length_medium")
  set_tests_properties("npctransport.${name}" PROPERTIES TIMEOUT ${medium_timeout})
  set_tests_properties("npctransport.${name}" PROPERTIES COST 2)
endforeach(test)

foreach (test ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/npctransport/test/expensive_test_fg_anchoring_from_protobuf.py
${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/npctransport/test/expensive_test_init_from_output.py)
  GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name ${test} NAME)
  add_test("npctransport.${name}" ${IMP_TEST_SETUP} python ${test})
  set_tests_properties("npctransport.${name}" PROPERTIES LABELS "IMP.npctransport;test;length_expensive")
  set_tests_properties("npctransport.${name}" PROPERTIES TIMEOUT ${expensive_timeout})
  set_tests_properties("npctransport.${name}" PROPERTIES COST 3)
endforeach(test)

set(cpp_tests )

foreach (test ${cpp_tests})
   GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name ${test} NAME)
   GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name_we ${test} NAME_WE)
   add_executable("npctransport.${name}" ${test})
   target_link_libraries("npctransport.${name}"     imp_npctransport
    ${IMP_BASE_LIBRARY}
${IMP_BENCHMARK_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CGAL_LIBRARY}
${IMP_ALGEBRA_LIBRARY}
${IMP_KERNEL_LIBRARY}
${IMP_DISPLAY_LIBRARY}
${IMP_SCORE_FUNCTOR_LIBRARY}
${IMP_STATISTICS_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CORE_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CONTAINER_LIBRARY}
${IMP_ATOM_LIBRARY}
${IMP_RMF_LIBRARY}
    ${RMF_LIBRARIES}
${PROTOBUF_LIBRARIES}
${AVROCPP_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.SYSTEM_LIBRARIES}
${GPERFTOOLS_LIBRARIES}
${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LIBRARIES}
${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LIBRARIES}
${LOG4CXX_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.RANDOM_LIBRARIES}
${CGAL_LIBRARIES}
${ANN_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.REGEX_LIBRARIES})
   set_target_properties("npctransport.${name}" PROPERTIES
                         RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/npctransport/"
                         OUTPUT_NAME ${name_we})
   add_test("npctransport.${name}" ${IMP_TEST_SETUP}
            "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/npctransport/${name_we}${CMAKE_EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX}")
   set_tests_properties("npctransport.${name}" PROPERTIES LABELS "IMP.npctransport;test;length_short")
   set_tests_properties("npctransport.${name}" PROPERTIES TIMEOUT ${short_timeout})
   set_tests_properties("npctransport.${name}" PROPERTIES COST 1)
   set(executables ${executables} "npctransport.${name}")
endforeach(test)


set(mdcpp_tests ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/npctransport/test/medium_test_main.cpp)

foreach (test ${mdcpp_tests})
   GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name ${test} NAME)
   GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name_we ${test} NAME_WE)
   add_executable("npctransport.${name}" ${test})
   target_link_libraries("npctransport.${name}"     imp_npctransport
    ${IMP_BASE_LIBRARY}
${IMP_BENCHMARK_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CGAL_LIBRARY}
${IMP_ALGEBRA_LIBRARY}
${IMP_KERNEL_LIBRARY}
${IMP_DISPLAY_LIBRARY}
${IMP_SCORE_FUNCTOR_LIBRARY}
${IMP_STATISTICS_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CORE_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CONTAINER_LIBRARY}
${IMP_ATOM_LIBRARY}
${IMP_RMF_LIBRARY}
    ${RMF_LIBRARIES}
${PROTOBUF_LIBRARIES}
${AVROCPP_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.SYSTEM_LIBRARIES}
${GPERFTOOLS_LIBRARIES}
${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LIBRARIES}
${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LIBRARIES}
${LOG4CXX_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.RANDOM_LIBRARIES}
${CGAL_LIBRARIES}
${ANN_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.REGEX_LIBRARIES})
   set_target_properties("npctransport.${name}" PROPERTIES
                         RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/npctransport/"
                         OUTPUT_NAME ${name_we})
   add_test("npctransport.${name}" ${IMP_TEST_SETUP}
            "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/npctransport/${name_we}${CMAKE_EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX}")
   set_tests_properties("npctransport.${name}" PROPERTIES LABELS "IMP.npctransport;test;length_medium")
   set_tests_properties("npctransport.${name}" PROPERTIES TIMEOUT ${medium_timeout})
   set_tests_properties("npctransport.${name}" PROPERTIES COST 1)
   set(executables ${executables} "npctransport.${name}")
endforeach(test)

set(excpp_tests )

foreach (test ${excpp_tests})
   GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name ${test} NAME)
   GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name_we ${test} NAME_WE)
   add_executable("npctransport.${name}" ${test})
   target_link_libraries("npctransport.${name}"     imp_npctransport
    ${IMP_BASE_LIBRARY}
${IMP_BENCHMARK_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CGAL_LIBRARY}
${IMP_ALGEBRA_LIBRARY}
${IMP_KERNEL_LIBRARY}
${IMP_DISPLAY_LIBRARY}
${IMP_SCORE_FUNCTOR_LIBRARY}
${IMP_STATISTICS_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CORE_LIBRARY}
${IMP_CONTAINER_LIBRARY}
${IMP_ATOM_LIBRARY}
${IMP_RMF_LIBRARY}
    ${RMF_LIBRARIES}
${PROTOBUF_LIBRARIES}
${AVROCPP_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.SYSTEM_LIBRARIES}
${GPERFTOOLS_LIBRARIES}
${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LIBRARIES}
${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LIBRARIES}
${LOG4CXX_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.RANDOM_LIBRARIES}
${CGAL_LIBRARIES}
${ANN_LIBRARIES}
${BOOST.REGEX_LIBRARIES})
   set_target_properties("npctransport.${name}" PROPERTIES
                         RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/npctransport/"
                         OUTPUT_NAME ${name_we})
   add_test("npctransport.${name}" ${IMP_TEST_SETUP}
            "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/test/npctransport/${name_we}${CMAKE_EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX}")
   set_tests_properties("npctransport.${name}" PROPERTIES LABELS "IMP.npctransport;test;length_expensive")
   set_tests_properties("npctransport.${name}" PROPERTIES TIMEOUT ${expensive_timeout})
   set_tests_properties("npctransport.${name}" PROPERTIES COST 1)
   set(executables ${executables} "npctransport.${name}")
endforeach(test)

add_custom_target("imp_npctransport_tests" ALL DEPENDS ${executables})
